General.Name: Kure Technologies Inc
General.Description: Kure Technologies, Inc. does not have significant operations. Previously, the company, through its subsidiary, Look Communications Inc., offered digital television broadcasting services to residential and business subscribers. The company was formerly known as Unique Broadband Systems, Inc. and changed its name to Kure Technologies, Inc. in March 2017. Kure Technologies, Inc. was incorporated in 1998 and is headquartered in Thornhill, Canada.
General.Address: 120 Spinnaker Way, Concord, ON, Canada, L4K 2P6
